```{r}
library(reticulate)
virtualenv_create("ambiente")
```

```{r}
use_virtualenv("ambiente")
py_install("pandas", envname = "ambiente")
```

```{r}
start <- Sys.time()
flights <- read.csv(unz('dados/flights.csv.zip', 'flights.csv'))
end <- Sys.time()
end - start
```

```{r}
library(readr)
start <- Sys.time()
flights <- read_csv('dados/flights.csv.zip')
end <- Sys.time()
end - start
```

```{python}
import time
import pandas as pd
start = time.time()
flights = pd.read_csv("dados/flights.csv.zip", compression="zip", header=0, sep=",", low_memory=False)
end = time.time()
end - start
```
